List of all members.

Detailed Description

The enet client used with the netflooder.

It uses the sigc++ library for signal/slot mechanism.

Definition at line 44 of file enetflooderclient.h.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Network::EnetFlooderClient::treatPacket ( NetPacketBase *  p,
ENetEvent *  e 
) [private]

Treat a single received network packet.

The NetPacketBase may be netDeserialized before a call to this function

The ENetEvent pointer shound not be NULL cause it is used to netDeserialize the correct packet subclass when its type is known.

Parameters:
p The packet in its base form
e The ENetEvent coming from eventLoop()

bool RainbruRPG::Network::EnetClient::connected [protected, inherited]

Is this peer successfully connected.

Set by default to false, this value is set to true if the peer is succeffully created.
